items.content_html: ‚ö†Ô∏è EXPERIMENTAL - ts_df, short for Typescript Dataframe, is a simple lightweight application library for parsing csv, tsv, and other delimited files, performing EDA (exploratory data analysis), and data processing operations on multivariate datasets. Think pandas but written in Typescript and developed on the Bun.js Runtime.

Think pandas but written in Typescript and developed on the Bun.js Runtime.

items.content_html: "easy-api-encryptor" is a lightweight NPM package facilitating seamless encryption and decryption of data between Node.js and React.js. Ensure secure communication in your applications with minimal setup, making it easy to protect sensitive information during transit.

items.content_html: ImgSpotter is a lightweight web application designed for effortless image detection and exploration. With ImgSpotter, you can quickly select a folder, and the application will automatically detect and display images, allowing you to navigate through them with ease.
